author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: I got the ML and Lupin Encylopedia Linked
body:
Just check out ANS. I also mentioned those tidbits Dale shared with the rest 
of us. Of course I gave him credit for it. I just figured that the 
Encylopedia and ML could use a little more promotion, and they have been 
good to me, so...BTW, did something happen with the petition? It seemed to 
have gone down from about 500 to 200
